original_text: But my mercy shall not depart away from him, as I took it from Saul, whom I put away before thee.
korean_text: 내가 네 앞에서 물러나게 한 사울에게서 내 은총을 빼앗은 것처럼 그에게서 빼앗지는 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: But my mercy shall not depart away from him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나의 긍휼은 그에게서 떠나지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: as I took it from Saul
whom I put away before thee
